summary: This code defines the AIInput class, which allows for the collection of various inputs including camera images, microphone audio, user text input, and custom input values. It also supports committing different types of inputs at the same time.

details.comment: This code defines the AIInput class, which allows for the collection of various inputs including camera images, microphone audio, user text input, and custom input values. It also supports committing different types of inputs at the same time.
